comments: This JSON file holds the summary information from which the app builds the various services and manifests.
It's not a manifest, image service or auth service! - look at what the app generates for reference.
This is just the app-specific plumbing to make the app work, not a recipe or reference implementation.

files.label: Standard login

metadata.label: Note
metadata.value: This interaction pattern assumes the user can interact with something in the opened window

auth_services.label: Login to Example Institution
auth_services.description: Example Institution requires that you log in with your example account to view this content.

files.label: Login with degraded access for unauthed users

metadata.label: Note
metadata.value: This interaction pattern assumes the user can interact with something in the opened window

auth_services.label: Login to Example Institution for full quality
auth_services.description: Example Institution requires that you log in with your example account to view the full-quality content.
auth_services.failureDescription: You don't appear to have access to the full colour version. Access Policy

files.label: Kiosk

metadata.label: Note
metadata.value: This interaction pattern requires direct interaction without the user initiating it. The browser would need to be set up for this. Popups emabled for the domain.

auth_services.label: Internal cookie granting service
auth_services.failureDescription: Call Bob at ext. 1234 to reboot the cookie server

files.label: External auth, log in at {server}external-cookie/05_cader_idris.jpg

metadata.label: Note
metadata.value: No UI is offered by the viewer. You need to have acquired the cookie by logging in somewhere else. Go to {content-server}/external-cookie/05_cader_idris.jpg
